mapper.select: select memnum,memname,memaddr,mempwd,memprofile,memjob,memauth,memmail,meminmail,memmgr,memdept,memhire,memresign,membirth,memsignimg from (select * from member where memnum=1 and mempwd='1004') where memnum=#{memnum} and mempwd=#{mempwd}
select memnum,memname from member where memauth=4 and memdept=#{memdept}

select m.memnum, m.memname, m.meminmail, m.membirth, m.memaddr, d.dename, m.memjob, to_char(m.memhire, 'yyyy-mm-dd') memhire from member m, dept d where d.denum=m.memdept
and m.memdept=#{memdept}
and m.memname like '%'||#{memname}||'%'
and m.memname like '%'||#{memname}||'%'
mapper.update: update member set memresign=sysdate where memnum=#{memnum}
mapper.select: select m.memnum,m.memname,m.memaddr,m.mempwd,m.memprofile,m.memjob, m.memauth,m.memmail,m.meminmail,m.memmgr,m.memdept,m.memhire,m.memresign,m.membirth,m.memsignimg, d.dename from member m,dept d where memnum=#{memnum} and d.denum=m.memdept
select pyearly, psalary, trunc((psalary/12),0) pmonthsalary from pay where pmem=#{memnum}
select to_char(hisdate, 'yyyy-mm') hisdate, hisamount, hismem, hisnum from payhistory where hismem=#{hismem} order by hisdate desc
mapper.update: update member set memjob=#{memjob} where memnum=#{memnum}
update member set memdept=#{memdept} where memnum=#{memnum}
